channel.title: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more
channel.description: How do I make it so that when you wear a weapon it gives an emote. Also how do I make a weapon that looks like a fire cape but in whip form? I know how to add customs, but not how to do this. Also if my customs are in my Class8.Java where are the normal items? Like Red PHat Et cetera?

item.title: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The getStandAnim method is for standing in one spot and performing an emote.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more

item.title: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Weapon emotes are found in your getStandAnim method. Items such as party hats are dealt within the cache. As for having a custom item have that sort of texture, I have no idea. You may want to take a look at the model section for that.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more

item.title: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more

item.title: Adding an emote to an object, making a Fire weapon. And more
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

add the walking animation to the weapons id

and for the firecape, thats client sided, recolor a whip to firecape colors, i doubt ull be able to make the fire on the whip move tho

Read full topic
